about_the_game:
Welcome to Uncle Chuck Incorporated a dark animatronic survival horror game. Step into a world shrouded in mystery and suspense as you unravel the secrets behind the downfall of the legendary robotics entertainment company, Uncle Chuck Inc. Set in the eerie year of 2005, this adventure will take you deep into the heart of an abandoned office building, where every shadow hides a secret, and every creak in the floorboard could mean danger.

Story


In 2005, the renowned robotics entertainment company Uncle Chuck Inc. unexpectedly declared bankruptcy, shocking the world and leaving many questions unanswered. The company, once celebrated for its innovative animatronics and beloved characters, abruptly withdrew all its creations to its secluded headquarters upstate. Rumors soon spread of a hidden VHS tape containing the real reason behind the company's sudden collapse. This tape is said to be locked away somewhere within the forsaken halls of the Uncle Chuck office building. As an intrepid investigator, your mission is to infiltrate the headquarters, locate the VHS tape, and uncover the truth. But beware, the animatronic Uncle Chuck is still active and roaming the building, determined to protect the secrets at any cost.

Gameplay


Your journey begins at the gates of Uncle Chuck Inc.'s deserted headquarters. As you navigate through the dark, labyrinthine corridors, you'll need to solve intricate puzzles to unlock new areas of the building. Each solved puzzle brings you one step closer to the elusive VHS tape. Along the way, you must manage your inventory wisely, balancing key items necessary for progression with health items that will keep you in the game. Stealth is your greatest ally; Uncle Chuck's animatronic presence is a constant threat. Move quietly, hide in the shadows, and outsmart this relentless guardian to survive. Every decision you make could mean the difference between uncovering the truth or becoming another forgotten casualty of Uncle Chuck Inc.

Features


  • Inventory management
  • In depth stealth mechanics
  • Intelligent enemy AI
  • Smart level progression
  • Fun puzzles

Conclusion


Are you ready to face the unknown and uncover the truth behind Uncle Chuck Inc.'s mysterious downfall? The abandoned headquarters await, filled with secrets and dangers lurking in every corner. Sharpen your wits, manage your resources, and stay hidden to complete your mission. The truth is out there, hidden within the shadows of Uncle Chuck Incorporated. Will you emerge victorious, or will the animatronic guardian end your quest? The fate of the investigation lies in your hands.

name: Uncle Chuck Incorporated

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)

short_description: In 2005, the robotics entertainment company Uncle Chuck Inc. mysteriously declared bankruptcy. As an investigator, your mission is to infiltrate their abandoned headquarters, solve puzzles, and find a hidden VHS tape revealing the truth, all while evading the dangerous animatronic characters.
